name: Ninja Run: Zombies Fighter
description:
Ninja Run Game gives running ,jumping and sliding experience in 3 different seasons. Be a ninja for a day and race through the city!
100% Addictive ,fun and challenging game for all ages with free of cost.
GAMEPLAY:
Simply control the Ninja player with jump and slide buttons.
Don't interact with Enemy Objects, try to escape from those objects.
Collect the gold coins .
Wonderful game play experience.
Good Ninja style Background music and sounds.
Collect the Wind Power and Magnet Power.

FEATURES:
2D liquid graphics for smooth visible.
3 Amazing Seasons experience.
Unlimited game play experience.
Real Sounds experience.
Leader Boards integration.
